episodes.title: Son of Polygamist Cult Leader Warren Jeffs TELLS ALL: Horrors of FLDS Compound, Raids & Child Brides
episodes.description:

Rachel's Book: Breaking Free: How I Escaped Polygamy, the FLDS Cult, and My Father, Warren Jeffs https://a.co/d/16sOO0Z

Follow Rachel's story here: https://www.instagram.com/racheljblackmore?igsh=NXZhbnI3eGUzYm8z

On this episode of New World Old Soul, Melissa and Jeremy share a conversation with Rachel Blackmore and Ammon Jeffs, both of whom are the children of FLDS cult leader, Warren Jeffs.

Blackmore and Jeffs talk about their experience growing up in the FLDS cult, the raid and fall out of the FLDS compound in Eldorado Texas, and their life experience(s) since escaping the controversial cult.

episodes.title: Warren Jeffs Daughter Talks Abuse, Manipulation & How She Ultimately Broke Him.
episodes.description:
Check out Manta Sleep at http://tinyurl.com/mr5sym8s and make sure to use code: NWOS for 10% off your order!

To Watch the New World Old Soul Full Episode featuring Rachel Blackmore click here: https://youtu.be/pTbfyIxw4yU?si=biWa4Cxnw6QmTEyC

Rachel Blackmore is the daughter of the Fundamentalist Latter Day Saints Cult leader, Warren Jeffs.

Jeffs was convicted and imprisoned for sex crimes against multiple minors/followers.

In this New World Old Soul episode clip, Blackmore details how her father took over and gained control of the FLDS church/cult through manipulation.  Blackmore also details how her father sexually abused her and how she was able to overcome it.

episodes.title: My Dad Is Polygamist Cult Leader Warren Jeffs | Untold Horrors w/ FLDS Survivor Rachel Blackmore
episodes.description: Follow Rachel Blackmore's story of survival, hope & freedom here: https://www.instagram.com/racheljblackmore To Purchase Rachel's incredible book "Breaking Free: How I Escaped Polygamy, the FLDS Cult, and My Father, Warren Jeffs" shop here: https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/0062670530/ref=tmm_pap_swatch_0?ie=UTF8&qid=&sr= or https://www.harpercollins.com/products/breaking-free-rachel-jeffs On this episode of New World Old Soul, Melissa and Jeremy share in a conversation with Rachel (Jeffs) Blackmore. Rachel is the daughter of the infamous FLDS Polygamous cult leader Warren Jeffs who is serving a life sentence in prison for past transgressions wherein he sexually abused multiple minors. The emotional discussion covers Rachel's life growing up in the FLDS, her being abused by her father, insights into Warren Jeffs himself, etc.
